alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Holt; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Rock, north central Garfield and Holt Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 316 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Newport to 8 miles southwest of Amelia. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... O`Neill, Atkinson, Stuart, Chambers, Newport, Amelia, Inman, Emmet, Sybrant, Carson Lake, Sunfish Lake and Pony Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 271 and 323. Highway 281 between mile markers 164 and 192. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
